channel.title: How do i make some1 admin and where do i put the code of it
channel.description: how would i code a thing to make some1 an admin and after i get it coded where would i put it

item.title: How do i make some1 admin and where do i put the code of it
item.dc:creator: @sir_max789 sir max789
item.description:
@sir_max789 wrote:

Ok, this is only on some servers and dont blame me if it doesnt work(im 10 years old :P, but go into the client database and search for rights and then scroll until u find a list that says

If playername.equals.ignorecase(whatevernameofacharacter) repeatedly and then inside the field with the name enter the person u want to be a mod admin or owner 1 mod 2 admin and 3 owner. Then go into the characters file then change the rights there. Then recompile the server snd run it again.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make some1 admin and where do i put the code of it

item.title: How do i make some1 admin and where do i put the code of it
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Step#1: Open up your character file…
Step#2:Then open up the charecters file you want to edit,
Step#3:Now, under the part [CHARACTER], you should find ‘character-rights = 0’. If you want to make them a mod(silver crown) change the 0, to a 1. If you want to make them an admin(gold crown) change the 0, to a 2. If you want to make them the owner, change the 0 to a 3

and to change what npc says go to NPCHandler.java and find where it says thug life is offline and change it what you want to say.

Read full topic
